resources.string: "Some paths between the left and right sides of the board are faster than others. The computer goes down its fastest path. How do you respond?"
"You have a teleporter. Do you know how to use it? Pay attention to how many turns each move takes."
"Oh no! The computer has built its path before you even had a chance to start!"
"This time the computer has a revert and inside information about your path. How can you level the playing field?"
